title: Divya Kiran: Diamond-Studded Chandbali Pendant
features: This exquisite Chandbali pendant features a symmetrical floral design studded with dazzling round brilliant cut diamonds. The design culminates in a series of golden ball drops, known as 'gundlu'. The setting showcases meticulous craftsmanship, ensuring each diamond reflects maximum light. The overall design is reminiscent of traditional South Indian 'addigai' style jewelry, modernized for a contemporary appeal.
colors: Dominant gold with brilliant white diamonds.
occasions: festive celebrations like Sankranti and Diwali
or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Can be paired with a traditional silk saree or a modern evening gown.
description: This Chandbali pendant is a true heirloom piece, crafted with the highest quality materials and exceptional craftsmanship. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, lasting luster. The design blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with a modern sensibility, making it a versatile piece for any wardrobe. The diamonds provide unmatched brilliance and sparkle, ensuring you'll be the center of attention.
